DOC.brief_summary: To conduct pilot randomize placebo-controlled feasibility trial N-acetylcysteine ( NAC ) onychophagia , preliminarily assess tolerability effect pharmacotherapy young adult bite fingernail . It propose NAC help decrease fingernail biting .
